verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I surrender to Your throne, I surrender to Your throne I will make my heart Your home, Oh I Surrender to Your throne{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve taken things I’ve thought my own Only to reap all I’ve sown You’ve given back the years I’ve fought An ending love and grace You brought Eternal hope and peace You bring And forever unto You I will sing{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I surrender I surrender I surrender now (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Soften up this hardened clay, to be a servant this I pray{/lang-eng}
